name: Reverse Slice
description: Spin around and strike an enemy down, dealing 1161 Physical Damage. Deals up to 300% more damage to enemies with less than 50% Health.  Other enemies nearby take 100% of the damage inflicted to the primary target.
effectLines: Other enemies nearby take a percentage of the damage inflicted to the primary target.
coefDescription: Spin around and strike an enemy down, dealing $1 Physical Damage. Deals up to 300% more damage to enemies with less than 50% Health.  Other enemies nearby take 100% of the damage inflicted to the primary target.
